summary: After inadvertently stopping an Indian attack on his stagecoach while traveling in the American West, an English gentleman finds himself appointed sheriff of a nearby town.
cast: Kenneth More|Jayne Mansfield|Henry Hull|Bruce Cabot|Ronald Squire|William Campbell|Sidney James|Reed De Rouen|Charles Irwin|Donald Stewart|Clancy Cooper|Gordon Tanner|Robert Morley|David Horne|Eynon Evans|Tucker McGuire|Brandon Brady|Larry Taylor|Jack Lester|Nicholas Stuart|Sheldon Lawrence|Susan Denny|Charles Farrell|Jonas Applegarth|Joe Buffalo|Steven Berkoff|Janina Faye|Connie Francis|Cyril Kent|Alf Mangan|Al Mulock|Herbert Nelson|Brian Rawlinson|Mary Reynolds|Emile Stemmler|John Wilder
title: La rubia y el Sheriff
